scenario.title: forgtot pasword pop up

steps.string: Given the unsigned user accesses the conference management home page
When user clicks the login button
And clicks the forgot password link
Then new pop up will appears saying Send me a new password to my email address:
And Cancel button appears
And Continue button appears

scenario.title: Empty E-mail field in Sign in form

steps.string: Given the user accesses the conference management home page
When user clicks the Your Account button
And clicks the Forgot password link
Then new pop up will appear
And then click Continue button leaving E-mail field behind

scenario.title: Input valid data into Forgot password link

steps.string: Given user navigates to the Main page
When user click the Your Account button
And clicks the Forgot password link
And inputs registered data into 'E-mail' field
Then then click Continue button
And new message 'We send a new password to your email address'
And 'Close' button is shown

scenario.title: Input invalid data into Forgot password link

steps.string: Given user navigates to the Main page
When user click the Your Account button
And clicks the Forgot password link
And inputs not registered data into 'E-mail' field
Then then click Continue button
And new message 'We send a new password to your email address'
And 'Close' button is shown

cause.detailMessage: Could not instantiate new WebDriver instance of type class org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver (The path to the chromedriver driver executable must be set by the webdriver.chrome.driver system property; for more information, see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/downloads. The latest version can be downloaded from https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/downloads

The latest version can be downloaded from https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/downloads
